LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Building.label: Heavenly Witch Breeding Beast Insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Building.description: The Sky Witch Beast Bugs are the ground attack aircraft in the Arachne Swarm Fleet. Their long tentacles and powerful psychic levitation capabilities allow them to fly across the battlefield at high speed under the command of the Pilot Species, and according to the instructions, they can attack the invisible enemy swarms or assist the swarm's attack. \n\nThey need to take off to be effective!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Entity.label: Heavenly Witch Breeding Beast Insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Entity.description: What? This is a thingdef for recording quantities, and you should not see this under any circumstances.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Leaving.label: Heavenly Witch Beast Insect (taking off)
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.label: Hive Mothership
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompProperties_SendLe: There was a roar from the sky, countless insect swarms passed by the colony, and the shadow cast by a huge creature covered the sky and the sun——\n\nInsect Hive Mothership, the largest node creature in the Arachne Swarm, is also the pillar of the eternal expedition of the insect swarm. Now, there is such a terrifying thing occupying the sky above the colony. It will use all means to destroy your defenses and release an endless sea of ​​insects to drown your colonists until they leave orbit above the colony. Get ready for impact!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompProperties_FlyOve: The Hive Mothership is airdropping a Zerg force! This force will be airdropped near the Hive Mothership and provide cover for the Hive Mothership on the ground battlefield.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompProperties_ShipAr: An enemy warship is shelling the colony! Take cover now!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Fake.label: Hive Mothership
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Fake.label: Heavenly demon beast insect
